transcripts.text: But the last couple of days, you were quite active on Facebook and you got thousands of comments on your postings.  And it was quite horrific.  Some rape accusations were there and stuff like that.

Oh, I disagreed with feminists.  Therefore, I'm a rapist.  A woman can say yes.  A woman can jump on you, dry hump all over you, stick her tongue down your throat and beg you to screw her.  And then still, two or three years later, come back and say yes.  that it was a right.  And the world will believe her.
But to go further, I guess that's going to be a topic that most people are going to hate.  The topic is abortion, right?  A very dangerous topic to approach.
My body, my choices probably will go down as the most simple-minded slogan in human history.
